Question 13) When it is noon in the United States, the Sun, everyone knows, is lying in France. Just go to France in a minute to watch the sunset.
SAINT-EXUPERY, A. The little prince. Rio de Janeiro: Act, 1996.
The spatial difference cited is caused by which physical characteristic of the earth?
A) flattening of their polar regions.
B) movement around its own axis.
C) rounding of its geometric form.
D) periodic variation of its distance from the sun.
E) inclination in relation to its orbit plan.
